movieCollection.title: Movie Computer Screens
movieCollection.subtitle: A collection of computer interfaces from movies recreated for the web

noResults.title: No projects found

movieCollection.disclaimer: All trademarks/movies belong to their rights holders. This page links to fan recreations and demos. Additional or existing projects will be added or removed upon request. Disclaimer: Manuel Hintermayr assumes no responsibility for external links and their content. Opening external links is at your own risk. contribute.title: Know another project?
contribute.description: Do you know of other iconic computer interfaces from movies, TV shows, or games that are missing here? We'd love to add them to the collection!
